name: Crazy Hamster
synopsis: So cute, so crazy! It's Crazy Hamster! Help him to store his supplies and get home safely. The winter is coming. Crazy Hamster forgot to store his supplies. Now he has to visit different lands to get them before winter. Crazy Hamster is so crazy, that he sees nothing but the fruits. The lands he visits are full of traps and obstacles that he won't even notice. Touch the desired tool icon to select it. Then touch the trap in Crazy Hamster's way to neutralize it. Be careful: each tool can only be used a limited number of times. You have to help him and neutralize those traps. There's no time to lose! Crazy Hamster has already set off!
